import React,{useState} from "react"; import s from './AppHeader.module.css' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import user from '../../img/user.img' import basket from '../../img/basket.png' import coffee_ico from '../../img/coffee-7-64.png' const AppHeader = (props) => { const handleChange = event =>{ props.setSearchItem(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit = event =>{ alert(props.searchItem) event.preventDefault() } return (
Profile
Basket
Catalog
) } export default AppHeader
